layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x32
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x32
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x16
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 304x16 [color=#00FF00] [bgcolor=#008000]
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 64x16
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 64x16
            text run at (0,0) width 64: "1234"
        LayoutText {#text} at (64,0) size 448x16
          text run at (64,0) width 448: "567890123456789 xxxx xxxx xx"
